statements: SELECT * FROM sustainable_building_materials WHERE material_type = 'Concrete';
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit FROM sustainable_building_materials WHERE availability_status = TRUE ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type, cost_per_unit FROM sustainable_building_materials ORDER BY material_type ASC, cost_per_unit DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_building_materials WHERE cost_per_unit < 50.00 AND availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM sustainable_building_materials WHERE material_type = 'Wood' AND cost_per_unit > 100.00;
SELECT material_name, cost_per_unit FROM sustainable_building_materials WHERE material_type = 'Concrete' ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_building_materials WHERE availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM sustainable_building_materials WHERE cost_per_unit < 1000;
SELECT material_type, COUNT(material_id) AS total_materials FROM sustainable_building_materials GROUP BY material_type ORDER BY total_materials DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_description, cost_per_unit FROM sustainable_building_materials WHERE material_type IN ('Wood', 'Steel') ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM sustainable_materials WHERE material_type='wood';
SELECT material_name, material_source FROM sustainable_materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM construction_projects ORDER BY project_location DESC;
SELECT project_name, material_name FROM construction_projects JOIN sustainable_materials ON construction_projects.material_id = sustainable_materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM construction_projects INNER JOIN sustainable_materials ON construction_projects.material_id = sustainable_materials.material_id WHERE material_name = 'Recycled Plastic'
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM construction_projects WHERE project_location = 'New York' ORDER BY project_name DESC

SELECT construction_projects.project_name, sustainable_materials.material_type FROM construction_projects LEFT JOIN sustainable_materials ON construction_projects.material_id = sustainable_materials.material_id

SELECT material_name, COUNT(project_id) AS project_count FROM sustainable_materials INNER JOIN construction_projects ON sustainable_materials.material_id = construction_projects.material_id GROUP BY material_name ORDER BY project_count DESC
SELECT SUM(project_id) AS total_projects FROM construction_projects
SELECT * FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type, sustainability_rating FROM building_materials WHERE material_type = 'Concrete';
SELECT project_name, location FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT material_name, quantity_used FROM building_materials JOIN material_usage ON building_materials.material_id = material_usage.material_id WHERE quantity_used > 100;

SELECT project_name, material_name, quantity_used FROM projects JOIN material_usage ON projects.project_id = material_usage.project_id JOIN building_materials ON building_materials.material_id = material_usage.material_id;
SELECT * FROM building_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM building_materials WHERE sustainability_rating <= 2;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT material_name, quantity_used FROM building_materials JOIN material_usage ON building_materials.material_id = material_usage.material_id;

SELECT project_name, material_name, quantity_used FROM projects JOIN material_usage ON projects.project_id = material_usage.project_id JOIN building_materials ON building_materials.material_id = material_usage.material_id;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_building_materials;
SELECT material_name, sustainability_rating FROM sustainable_building_materials;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects;
SELECT * FROM material_properties WHERE material_id = 1;

SELECT project_name, material_name, quantity FROM construction_projects JOIN project_material_mapping ON construction_projects.project_id = project_material_mapping.project_id JOIN sustainable_building_materials ON project_material_mapping.material_id = sustainable_building_materials.id;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_building_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT material_name, material_type, sustainability_rating FROM sustainable_building_materials ORDER BY material_type;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT material_name, property_name, property_value FROM sustainable_building_materials JOIN material_properties ON sustainable_building_materials.id = material_properties.material_id;

SELECT project_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_material_used FROM construction_projects JOIN project_material_mapping ON construction_projects.project_id = project_material_mapping.project_id GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY total_material_used DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM building_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_information FROM material_suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT material_name, material_type, sustainability_rating FROM building_materials INNER JOIN material_prices ON building_materials.material_id = material_prices.material_id WHERE price < 1000 ORDER BY sustainability_rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM building_materials
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM building_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_information, location FROM material_suppliers WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT m.material_name, s.supplier_name, p.price FROM building_materials m JOIN material_prices p ON m.material_id = p.material_id JOIN material_suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id
